author: Partlyhuman

changelog.release_notes:
Version 2.7:
Lots of new settings!
- Optionally starts a new work session right away, if you don't like the manual method. 
- Customize the frequency of ticking while working: Anywhere from once a second to once every other minute.
- Customize frequency of long breaks, not just once every 4 sessions.
Bug fixes!

Version 2.5
- Fixed a bug where long breaks (recesses) didn't occur
- Preparing app for new options!

Version 2.4: 
- Recompiled under latest SDK 2.8 to fix rendering bugs
- Removed Russian language which required custom firmware

* 2.3 - Added setting to show system clock.
* 2.2 - Added French translation.
* 2.1 - Updated to use Pebble SDK Beta 2. Added Russian translation.
* 2.0 - Updated to use Pebble SDK version 2.0. httpebble no longer required, settings are stored on phone. A branch will be created for legacy-sdk-1.0.
* 1.0 - Initial release.

description:
PBLPom is a highly customizable, multilingual, easy-to-use, attractive work timer. You can use it with the Pomodoro Technique® or other time management systems.
